title: HEAD LIFT
description: Lift your head off the table and hold it as long as you can.

title: LEG RAISE/TOUCH OBJECT
description: Try to lift your leg high enough to touch the examiner’s hand.
options: Unable to lift leg off table

title: STRAIGHT LEG LIFT/DURATION
description: Raise your straight leg and hold it in the air.

title: SUPINE TO PRONE
description: Roll over from back to stomach.
options: Turns, can't free arm or assume prone

title: SIT-UPS
description: Perform sit-ups in multiple hand positions. (Scored from 0–6)

title: SUPINE TO SIT
description: Sit up from lying on your back.

title: ARM RAISE/STRAIGHTEN
description: Raise arms as high as you can.
options: Raises wrists to shoulder but not overhead

title: ARM RAISE/DURATION
description: Hold your arms above your head.

title: FLOOR SIT
description: From standing, sit on the floor.

title: ALL FOURS MANEUVER
description: Get onto hands and knees, and crawl.
options: Barely maintains all-fours, can't raise head
All-fours with head up, no crawling

title: FLOOR RISE
description: Kneel on floor, then stand up.

title: CHAIR RISE
options: Much difficulty, uses sides of chair

title: PICK-UP
description: Bend down to pick up an object from the floor.
